attires.name: Cowboy Hat
attires.description: A high-crowned, wide-brimmed hat best known as the defining piece of attire for the North American cowboy.

attires.name: Baseball Cap
attires.description: A type of soft cap with a rounded crown and a stiff peak projecting forward. It is a ubiquitous part of American casual wear.

attires.name: Coon-skin Cap
attires.description: A hat fashioned from the skin and fur of a raccoon, which became a symbol of American frontiersmen in the 18th and 19th centuries.
